I would love to have lunch with my welding instructor, Mr
I loved taking long baths in the tub with my dad when I was little.

content.text: I'm so sorry to hear about your mom! I lost mine when I was a kid too. What's your favorite way to remember her?
I love listening to my music collection. It was a big part of our relationship. What do you like to do in your free time?
I'm a personal chef, so I spend a lot of time in the kitchen. I also enjoy going to rock concerts.
I'm a big fan of rock music too! I love going to the gym to work out. Do you have any hobbies?
I really enjoy organizing my space. It helps me feel relaxed and in control.
That's a great way to de-stress! I love taking long baths. It's so relaxing.
I used to love taking baths when I was little. My dad would always give me bubble baths.
That's so sweet! I'm glad you have some fond memories of your dad.
Me too. He was a great dad.
I'm sure he's proud of the person you've become.
